name: The 7th Guest
content:
game:
  game_id: Groovie
  path: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      find "$src" -type f \( -name "*.gjd" -o -name "*.grv" -o -name "*.rl" -o -name
      "fat.*" -o -name "sphinx.fnt" \) -exec cp {} "$dst" \;'
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: t7g
- execute:
    args: $DISC/t7g $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 2
    requires: t7g
- execute:
    args: $DISC/t7g $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/selectcopy.sh
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR"
    file: /bin/chmod
